<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_snc_cls_idea">
    <x_snc_cls_idea action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <active>false</active>
        <description>Reference them multiple script includes</description>
        <episode display_value="NOWCommunity Live Stream - 2019-07-17">4c29d984dbf6b740f6d0a422ca961950</episode>
        <name>Putting constants in a script include</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var myConstants = Class.create();
myConstants.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {
    },

    type: 'myConstants'
};

myConstants.myProperty = gs.getProperty('foo');
myConstants.TABLE_NAME = 'x_snc_table_name';]]></script>
        <sys_created_by>chuck.tomasi</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2019-07-15 19:03:29</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>050908abdbee3740f6d0a422ca961928</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_updated_by>chuck.tomasi</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2019-07-26 18:30:39</sys_updated_on>
    </x_snc_cls_idea>
</record_update>
sys_metadata_link.sys_name: Putting constants in a script include
